text: niyata vasayenma numbala veta ohu tahanam kara ætte mala dæ, rudhiraya, sukara mamsa ha kavara deyak allah novana dæta kapana ladde da evaya. namut kavareku ho bala karanu læbuve nam ohu simava ikmavanneku ha abibava noyanneku lesin tora va (eya anubhava kirimata anumætiya æta.) niyata vasayenma allah ati ksamasili karuna gunayen yuktaya
